body_html:
Yeah, I think you can do that here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/osx/libtensorflow_cpu.sh#L30

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/osx/libtensorflow_gpu.sh#L31

by setting TF_NEED_MKL=0 and then we can probably merge this :)
body_text:
Yeah, I think you can do that here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/osx/libtensorflow_cpu.sh#L30
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/osx/libtensorflow_gpu.sh#L31
by setting TF_NEED_MKL=0 and then we can probably merge this :)
body:
Yeah, I think you can do that here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/osx/libtensorflow_cpu.sh#L30

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/osx/libtensorflow_gpu.sh#L31

by setting TF_NEED_MKL=0 and then we can probably merge this :)
